about_the_game:
Experience the world of the TV anime! "Attack on Titan 2: Final Battle" is slated to be released on July 5th, 2019!
In this title, in addition to adding new action elements such as "thunder spears" and "anti-Personnel omni-directional mobility gear", new characters, new modes, and other features are also included!

With this trial version, you can experience the ODM action from the base game "Attack on Titan 2"!

Note: Although save data from the trial version cannot be carried over to the retail version of "Attack on Titan 2"or "Attack on Titan 2: Final Battle", if you have clear data, you will be able to receive rewards for "Attack on Titan 2: Final Battle".
Note: Online features cannot be used.
Note: The release date may be changed without notice.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages: Frequent Violence or Gore, Nudity

detailed_description:
Experience the world of the TV anime! "Attack on Titan 2: Final Battle" is slated to be released on July 5th, 2019!
In this title, in addition to adding new action elements such as "thunder spears" and "anti-Personnel omni-directional mobility gear", new characters, new modes, and other features are also included!

With this trial version, you can experience the ODM action from the base game "Attack on Titan 2"!

Note: Although save data from the trial version cannot be carried over to the retail version of "Attack on Titan 2"or "Attack on Titan 2: Final Battle", if you have clear data, you will be able to receive rewards for "Attack on Titan 2: Final Battle".
Note: Online features cannot be used.
Note: The release date may be changed without notice.
legal_notice:
Based on the manga "Shingeki no Kyojin" by Hajime Isayama originally serialized in the monthly BESSATSU SHONEN magazine published by Kodansha Ltd.
©Hajime Isayama,Kodansha/"ATTACK ON TITAN"Production Committee. All Rights Reserved.

name: Attack on Titan 2 - A.O.T.2 - Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Win 8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core I5 2400 or over
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 VRAM 1GB or over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit Stereo 48kHzWAVE
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Win 8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i7 3770 or over
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 VRAM 2GB or over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit 5.1ch surround 48KHzWAVE

esrb.descriptors:
Blood and Gore
Language
Partial Nudity
Violence
